subject: Q4 Marketing Campaign Review
body:
Hi team,

I wanted to follow up on our Q4 marketing campaign. Can we schedule a meeting this week to review the performance metrics? I've attached the preliminary data.

Please let me know your availability for Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon.

Best regards,
Sarah
actionItems: Schedule meeting for Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon

subject: Your order has been shipped
body:
Hello,

Good news! Your order #12345-67890 has been shipped and is on its way to you.

Tracking number: 1Z999AA10123456784
Estimated delivery: November 26, 2025

You can track your package at any time.

Thank you for shopping with Amazon.

subject: Project Alpha - Code Review Needed
body:
Hey,

I've just pushed the new authentication module to the dev branch. Would appreciate if you could review the PR before EOD.

The main changes include:
- OAuth2 integration
- Token refresh mechanism
- User session management

Let me know if you have any questions.

Cheers,
Michael
actionItems: Review PR for authentication module before EOD

subject: New Course: Advanced React Patterns
body:
Hi there!

We've just released a new course that we think you'll love: Advanced React Patterns. This course covers:

- Higher-order components
- Render props
- Context API best practices
- Custom hooks

The course is now live and ready for you to start learning.

Happy learning!

subject: Design System V2.0 - Feedback Requested
body:
Hello,

I've completed the initial design for our new design system. I'd love to get your feedback on the following components:

- Button variants
- Color palette
- Typography scales
- Spacing tokens

The Figma file is ready for review. Let me know when you have time to go through it.

Thanks!
Emma

subject: Monthly Statement Available
body:
Dear Valued Customer,

Your monthly statement for November 2024 is now available in your online banking account.

Statement Summary:
- Account Balance: $3,247.52
- Total Deposits: $4,200.00
- Total Withdrawals: $1,825.30

To view your complete statement, please log in to your online banking account.

Thank you for banking with us.

subject: Weekly Team Digest - 15 new messages
body:
Here's what happened in your team channels this week:

#general: 8 new messages
#project-alpha: 5 new messages
#random: 2 new messages

Most active members:
1. John Doe (12 messages)
2. Jane Smith (8 messages)
3. You (3 messages)

Stay connected with your team!

subject: Daily Crunch: AI startup raises $100M
body:
Good morning! Here are today's top tech stories:

1. AI startup SecureChat raises $100M Series B
2. Apple announces new MacBook Pro with M4 chip
3. Tesla's Cybertruck production hits 100K units
4. Google introduces new AI search features
5. Meta's VR headset sales double year-over-year

Read more at techcrunch.com

subject: CONGRATULATIONS! You've won $1,000,000!
body:
Dear Lucky Winner!

You have been selected as the winner of our international lottery! To claim your prize of $1,000,000, please send your personal details and bank account information to this email immediately.

This is a limited time offer! Act now!

Click here to claim: http://suspicious-link.fake

subject: Project Proposal - E-commerce Platform
body:
Hi there,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm writing to propose a collaboration on developing a modern e-commerce platform.

Project scope:
- React/Next.js frontend
- Node.js/Express backend
- PostgreSQL database
- Payment integration
- Admin dashboard

Timeline: 8-10 weeks
Budget: $25,000 - $35,000

I'd love to discuss this opportunity further. Are you available for a call this week?

Best regards,
Alex
